alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 6:22PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dale and northeastern Coffee Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 622 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles north of New Brockton, or 13 miles southwest of Brundidge. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Rucker, Java, Chestnut Grove, Mixons Crossroads, Greater Salem Church, Victoria, Frisco, Eanon, Lowry Mill, Rocky Head, Roeton, Tabernacle, Arcus, Hwy 231 Pea River Bridge, Woodland Grove Church and Jack. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
